item.title: 0722 Install Hugo on Yellow
item.description: Install sudo pacman -S hugo In folder websites hugo new install test1 No content when viewing on localhost:1313 because a new site is empty! Visual Studio Code Tried to install Insiders version (latest) but no idea how to do this. Instead, used yay -S vscodium-bin
